Verses: 1 ratchiyum Karththaave, Bakthiyullavan Atruppogiraan; Unmaiyullavargal Manupuththiraril Kuraindhirukkiraargal.
2 avaravar Thangal Thozharode Poipesugiraargal; Ichchaga Udhadugalaal Irumanadhaaip Pesugiraargal.
3 ichchagampesugira Ellaa Udhadugalaiyum, Perumaigalaip Pesugira Naavaiyum Karththar Aruththuppoduvaar.
4 avargal: Engal Naavugalaal Merkolluvom, Engal Udhadugal Engaludaiyadhu; Yaar Engalukku Aandavan Endru Sollugiraargal.

5 ezhaigal Paazhaakkappattadhinimiththamum, Eliyavargal Vidum Perumoochchinimiththamum, Naan Ippozhudhu Ezhundhu, Avanmel Seerugiravargalukku Avanaik Kaaththu Sugamaayirukkappannuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
6 karththarudaiya Sorkal Man Kugaiyil Ezhudharam Urukki, Pudamidappatta Vellikkoppaana Suththa Sorkalaayirukkiradhu.
7 karththaave, Neer Avargalaik Kaappaatri, Avargalai Endraikkum Indha Sandhadhikku Vilakkik Kaaththukkolluveer.
8 manupuththiraril Sandaalar Uyarndhirukkumbodhu, Dhunmaarkkar Engum Sutriththirivaargal.
